decisions.name: Already_create_record_for_risk_carrier
decisions.label: Already create record for risk carrier ?

Flow.description: On agreement insert, Insert Agreement line items for program's treaty, section and covered ceding company

formulas.name: LossDepositModeCALC
formulas.expression: CASE(TEXT({!each_Request.LossDepositMode__c}), "1", "Cash", "3", "Letter of Credit", "2", "Security", "4", "Trust account", /* Default label if no match found */ "NIL" )

Flow.label: CLM - Agreement - Insert Agreement Line Items
